Copper Wrench ​

vc:copper_wrench

ComponentValue
StackableNo
EnchantableYes (10)
Deals DamageYes (4)
Max Durability100
Damage Chance5% - 10%

About ​

The copper wrench is a tool that can be used to rotate blocks 90 degrees
